description: Try our easy to follow Beetroot & Goat's Cheese Filo Tart recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Savoury pie & tart,Pescatarian,High fibre,High protein,Seafood free,Vegetarian,Sesame free,Beetroot
name: Beetroot & Goat's Cheese Filo Tart Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Thinly slice beetroot using a mandoline. Arrange in a baking dish lined with baking paper. Drizzle with honey, sprinkle with thyme leaves and season. Cover with foil and bake for 20 minutes or until just tender.
Meanwhile, heat oil in a frying pan over low heat. Cook onions and vinegar for 20 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Brush each filo sheet with butter and layer on top of each other. Lay into a 20x30cm pan, folding in ends. Prick base with a fork. Bake for 10 minutes.
Spread onion mixture over pastry. Top with beetroot slices and crumble over cheese. Finish with hazelnuts. Bake for 20 minutes or until golden. Cut into pieces and serve.
